item.title: Using Vagrant
item.description: Why When I started to learn about buffer overflows and memory exploits etc I found that lots of the tutorials and material left out the details of environment specifics. Therefore when I came to follow through the tutorials I ended up with radically different results, got confused and felt like giving up. Virtualisation FTW These days it is easy to run virtual machines and Oracle’s virtualbox is free to use and is stable enough to not have caused me too many issues.
